commits.author: Steven Rowe
commits.sourceNew: /** * Returns true iff the ref starts with the given prefix. * Otherwise false. * * @param ref * the {@link BytesRef} to test * @param prefix * the expected prefix * @return Returns true iff the ref starts with the given prefix. * Otherwise false. */ public static boolean startsWith(BytesRef ref, BytesRef prefix) { return sliceEquals(ref, prefix, 0); }
commits.sourceOld: /** * Returns true iff the ref starts with the given prefix. * Otherwise false. * * @param ref * the {@link BytesRef} to test * @param prefix * the expected prefix * @return Returns true iff the ref starts with the given prefix. * Otherwise false. */ public static boolean startsWith(BytesRef ref, BytesRef prefix) { return sliceEquals(ref, prefix, 0); }
